League

Rules

  • First to 21 points, but you must win by 2 clear points
  • Decide who serves first by a short rally before the game, or spin a bat
  • Change serve every 5 points
  • The serve must bounce once on either side of the court
  • If the bat hits the table on the serve, a point is awarded to the opponent
  • If the serve touches the net and goes in, a let is called and the serve is taken again
  • There is no limit on the amount of lets
  • Subsequent points must bounce once in the opponent's half
  • If it touches the table, it's in — no matter how thin the touch may be
